description: Comprehensive lean output review and server.py refactor. Added ~57 tests for text format coverage across fast_search, fast_refs, fast_explore, fast_goto, trace_call_path. Fixed include_context in fast_refs text output, hierarchy formatting in fast_explore, truncation indicators. Refactored server.py from 1188→648 lines by extracting search.py, navigation.py, explore.py and wrapper modules. All 597 tests passing.
